name: Self-Directed Learning: An NLS9 Adventure
description:
Self Directed Learning is an interactive fiction game that allows players to virtually experience the 9th New Librarians Symposium being held in Adelaide on July 5 to 7, 2019. Users are prompted to enter some information, but most of the game simply requires clicking links that represent choices to move through the game. 

If you have any questions, comments, or bug reports please contact me via email or on Twitter @BennyKenobi I hope you enjoy playing!
